title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to environmental protection. Explore key concepts in sustainability and natural resource management for a better understanding of our planet.

title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to protect the environment. Learn about sustainable practices and the impact of human activities on the planet.

title: Intermediate German: Countries and Landscapes
description: Examine the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries and the language used to discuss them.
skills: Vocabulary related to countries and landscapes
prerequisites: Familiarity with German grammar and vocabulary
learning_outcomes: Understand and use German language related to human and physical geography. Discuss German-speaking countries and their landscapes, expanding vocabulary and cultural understanding. Improve intermediate-level German communication skills.

title: Intermediate French: People and Places
description: Gain an introduction to the physical and human geography of France and explore the language used to speak about them.
prerequisites: Familiarity with basic French grammar and vocabulary
learning_outcomes: Understand the physical and human geography of France. Learn vocabulary related to French geography and culture. Improve French language skills in the context of people and places in France.
